snippet.title: Starfox 64: Survival (Release Trailer)
snippet.description:
Commissioned by Kasper. Made in collaboration with zel ( https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXUJgD8VMY_yEHY8ebY4k-g )
Subscribe for more Retro Mods!
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Kazestuff
🎥 https://www.twitch.tv/kazesm64
🐦 https://twitter.com/KazeEmanuar


Download now!
https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/5566/

**** Instructions ****
 - Go to https://www.marcrobledo.com/RomPatcher.js/
 - Open your legally obtained Ocarina of Time NTSC-U 1.0 ROM as the "ROM file" (Z64 format)
 - Open the .bps as the "patch file"
 - Apply the patch
 - Now play the newly patched ROM.
 - ***** MAKE SURE YOU SET THE ROM TO 8MB IN YOUR EMULATOR OR IT WILL NOT RUN! *****


Changelog (v 1.1):
 - Enemies are no longer able to be out of bounds
 - Fixed an issue where the pause screen lagged
 - Fixed an issue regarding chests
 - Fixed an issue where you could interact with the fire from really far away
 - New patches for either .z64 or .n64 ROMs

This patch is for .z64 roms, however if your ROM is .n64, here is what you can do to convert it:
 - Download Tool64 from here: https://www.zophar.net/download_file/2854
 - Open it up, and go to File, then Open, and choose the folder that your rom is in.
 - Then right click your rom file and click "Big Endian".
 - Now you should have a ROM ending in .z64 that you can patch.
